chat.welcomeDescription: I'm your AI programming assistant, focused on improving development workflows. I can help you write code, optimize performance, generate tests, analyze architecture, and perform various development tasks~
chat.greeting: Hello, I'm Takumi, your AI programming assistant! How can I help you?
chat.analyzeProject: Help me analyze the code structure and architecture of this project
chat.optimizeCode: Optimize code performance and refactor this function
chat.generateTests: Generate unit test cases and test documentation
chat.llmSupportDesc: Support for multiple LLM providers including OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, etc.
chat.fileOperationsDesc: Intelligently read, write and edit files, supporting multiple programming languages
chat.codebaseNavigationDesc: Explore and search project code, quickly locate and analyze code structure
chat.planModeDesc: Break down complex tasks into manageable steps and execute plans step by step

model.title: Model Configuration
model.mainTooltip: Used for main code generation and complex reasoning tasks
model.smallTooltip: Used for simple tasks like generating commit messages

behavior.title: Behavior Configuration
behavior.languageTooltip: Language for AI responses and interface display
behavior.approvalModeTooltip: Controls confirmation behavior when AI executes tools

approvalModeLabels.suggest: Suggest Mode - All operations require confirmation
approvalModeLabels.autoEdit: Auto Edit - Auto edit files, commands require confirmation
approvalModeLabels.fullAuto: Full Auto - All operations execute automatically

plugins.title: Plugin Configuration
plugins.tooltip: Configure plugins used by the project
plugins.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete plugin "{{plugin}}"?
